mapper.select: select oi.oi_no as "oi_no" , (select s_name from store s where oi.s_no=s.s_no) as "S_NAME" , c_phone as "c_phone" , (case gender when '1' then '남' else '여' end) as "GENDER" , age as "age" , order_time as "order_time" , pickup_time as "pickup_time" from order_info oi where is_del = 'F'

select count(oi_no)||'' "data" , case gender when '1' then '남자' else '여자' end "label" from order_info where s_no = (select s_no from store where s_id = #{s_id}) group by gender order by count(oi_no) desc
select count(s_no)||'' "data", age||'대' "label" from (select oi.s_no as "S_NO", oi.age as "AGE" from order_menu om, order_info oi where om.oi_no = oi.oi_no) group by age order by 2
